Package dataAccess

Class DataAccess

java.lang.Object
dataAccess.DataAccess
public class DataAccess
extends java.lang.Object
Implements the Data Access utility to the objectDb database

  • Constructor Details

    • DataAccess

      public DataAccess​(boolean initializeMode)

    • DataAccess

      public DataAccess()

  • Method Details

    • initializeDB

      public void initializeDB()
      This method initializes the database with some trial events and questions. It is invoked by the business logic when the option "initialize" is used in the tag dataBaseOpenMode of resources/config.xml file

    • createEvent

      public Event createEvent​(java.lang.String description, java.util.Date date) throws EventAlreadyExistException
      Throws:
      EventAlreadyExistException

    • createQuestion

      public Question createQuestion​(Event event, java.lang.String question, float betMinimum) throws QuestionAlreadyExist
      This method creates a question for an event, with a question text and the minimum bet
      Parameters:
      event - to which question is added
      question - text of the question
      betMinimum - minimum quantity of the bet
      Returns:
      the created question, or null, or an exception
      Throws:
      QuestionAlreadyExist - if the same question already exists for the event

    • getEvents

      public java.util.Vector<Event> getEvents​(java.util.Date date)
      This method retrieves from the database the events of a given date
      Parameters:
      date - in which events are retrieved
      Returns:
      collection of events

    • addForecast

      public Forecast addForecast​(Question question, java.lang.String result, int fee) throws ForecastAlreadyExistException
      This methods inserts the given forecast in the database.
      Parameters:
      question - The question of the forecast.
      result - The result of the forecast.
      fee - The fee of the forecast.
      Throws:
      ForecastAlreadyExistException

    • checkLogin

      public boolean checkLogin​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)

    • getEventsMonth

      public java.util.Vector<java.util.Date> getEventsMonth​(java.util.Date date)
      This method retrieves from the database the dates in a month for which there are events
      Parameters:
      date - of the month for which days with events want to be retrieved
      Returns:
      collection of dates

    • open

      public void open​(boolean initializeMode)

    • existQuestion

      public boolean existQuestion​(Event event, java.lang.String question)

    • register

      public void register​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String email, byte[] hashedPassword, java.util.Date birthdate, byte[] salt)
      Registers a new user with standard permits.
      Parameters:
      username - User's name.
      firstName - User's first name.
      lastName - User's las name.
      address - User's current bill home address.
      email - User's email.
      hashedPassword - User's hashed password.
      birthdate - The birthday date of the user.
      salt - The salt used in password hashing.

    • isUserInDB

      public boolean isUserInDB​(java.lang.String username)
      Returns true if the username is already in the data base.
      Parameters:
      username -
      Returns:
      True if the username is already in the data base.

    • getUser

      public User getUser​(java.lang.String username) throws UserNotFoundException
      Returns the user with the username passed by parameter.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The user with the username passed by parameter.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException

    • close

      public void close()
